name: Fatal Fury Special
overview: Garou Densetsu Special  Hanyu Pinyin: È láng chuán shuō, literally "Hungry Wolf Legend", a literal translation of the Japanese title) is a pirated port of Fatal Fury Special by Hummer Team, made for the Famicom in 1995. This is a port of the SNES version judging by the title screen music and the chomping wolf icon when selecting an option.
